description:
DisplayFusion will make your multi-monitor life much easier! With powerful features like Multi-Monitor Taskbars, TitleBar Buttons and fully customizable HotKeys, DisplayFusion will make managing your multiple monitors easy.


Change: New Advanced Setting: Disable Full Screen Check for Maximizing to Split Monitors Change: New Advanced Setting: Allow Gadget/Sidebar/Widget Windows to be Detected by DisplayFusion Change: Added CPU model to troubleshooting info tab Change: Added an option to Settings Alt+Tab to disable the close buttons on Alt+Tab previews Fix: Resolved an issue that caused the desktop wallpaper to not apply on some systems Fix: Resolved a bunch of issues with taskbar buttons Fix: Monitor order no longer changes when disabling a monitor Fix: Resolved a compatibility issue with ESET, web browsers, and DisplayFusion Fix: Font size on taskbar button hover previews is now correct on scaled monitors Fix: Resovled some UI scaling issues Fix: Resolved some UI rendering issues Fix: Resolved an issue that added some unwanted application windows to the Windows taskbar Fix: Changing the "TitleBar Button Offset" no longer requires restarting DisplayFusion Fix: Alt+Tab improvements Fix: Taskbar text size when text scaling is in use Fix: Taskbar "small icon" improvements Fix: Resolved a memory leak in the taskbar Fix: Many performance improvements and caching improvements Fix: Website wallpaper sometimes stopped working Fix: Middle-clicking an Edge window now re-opens it correctly Fix: PWA taskbar icon improvements Fix: Monitor configuration improvements Fix: Taskbar compatibility improvements Fix: Wallpaper black screen issue resolved Fix: Wallpaper colour banding issue resolved Fix: Resolved an issue that prevented Explorer windows from being middle-click moved Fix: Resolved an issue with middle-click window moving Fix: Game performance improvements, reduced stutters Fix: Taskbar compatibility improvements (FMD and others) Fix: Escape key now works correctly again on the Alt+Tab Handler Fix: Winamp panes no longer get separate taskbar buttons Fix: Font scaling for taskbar button right-click menus should now be correct when using Windows Accessibility Text Size Fix: Resolved a dependency issue for Scripted Functions Fix: qlock no longer incorrectly appears in Alt+Tab handler
